title: daybreak icon and even emote bug maybe?
body: I have the icon and I have it equipped but the emote isnt working. Do i need to have dawnbringer riven for the emote or can it work on other champs? I saw a thread saying that it should work with any champion but the emote isnt showing when I press ctrl + 6. All that shows up is the mastery emote. I also tried a champion that I didnt have a mastery with and it still didnt show up. Any ideas? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What game mode are you trying to use the emote?  It might not work in a practice tool or custom game, as a heads up!
